frameworks.name: React
frameworks.description: React is a JavaScript library for creating user interfaces. Its core principles are declarative code, efficiency, and flexibility. Simply specify what your component looks like and React will keep it up-to-date when the underlying data changes
frameworks.framework_details: These are examples written in pure JavaScript.
